discussion.p: Table 97 [tab:time.format.spec] enumerates 'q' and 'Q' but those are not specified in chrono-format-spec provided in paragraph 1 of sub-clause .
Status to Tentatively Ready and priority to 0 after eight positive votes on the reflector.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4835.

li.p: Change the type grammar element in p1 as indicated:

blockquote.pre: type: one of a A b B c C d D e F g G h H I j m M n p q Q r R S t T u U V w W x X y Y z Z %
